courses.name: Cellular and Molecular Neurobiology of the Synapse

cmCourseInfo.description: Examination of all aspects of the synapse in both the peripheral and central nervous systems of invertebrates and vertebrates. Topics include: neuroplasticity, synapse formation, synaptic transmission, synaptic modulation, and the molecular biological basis of neurodegenerative disorders.
cmCourseInfo.title: Cellular and Molecular Neurobiology of the Synapse

breadthTypes.description: BR=4 Living Things and Their Environment
